column4: yɛserɛ hom na yetu hom fo wɔ Ewuradze Jesus mu dɛ
column5: mbrɛ hom nyaa no hɛn hɔ mbrɛ ɔsɛ dɛ hom nantsew na hom sɔ Nyankopɔn enyi no
column6: dɛ mbrɛ hom yɛ yi ara
column7: dɛmara na hom mbor do pii."

column2: "Na homankasa hom nyim ahyɛdze a yɛnam Ewuradze Jesus do hyɛɛ hom no."

column4: hom nyi homho mfi ndwamansɛm ho;"

column2: "dɛ hom mu biara bohu mbrɛ obesi nye ne yer atsena wɔ ahotsew nye enyidzi mu."
"Nnyɛ akɔndɔ nhyɛdo mu dɛ amanamamfo a wonnyim Nyankopɔn;"
"amma obiara eemmbu do ennkesisi no nua wɔ asɛm no mu
column3: osiandɛ Ewuradze nye yinom nyina ho werdzifo
column4: dɛ mbrɛ yɛbɔɔ hom nkaa nkan no

column2: "Na Nyankopɔn ammfrɛ hɛn annkɔ efifidze mu

column3: nnyɛ nyimpa bi na ɔpow no
column4: na Nyankopɔn a ɔdze no Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn ama hom no a."

column3: onnhia hom dɛ obi kyerɛw brɛ hom; osiandɛ Nyankopɔn akyerɛkyerɛ homankasa dɛ hom ndodɔ homho."

column2: "Na ampa so hom yɛ no wɔ enuanom a wɔwɔ Masidonia nyina ho. Naaso enuanom
"na hom mbɔ mbɔdzen nyɛ komm na hom nyɛ homankasa hom adze
column3: na hom mfa hom nsa nyɛ edwuma

column2: "na hom aanantsew dɛ mbrɛ ɔfata wɔ hɔn a wɔwɔ ekyir no enyim

column3: wɔ hɔn a wɔadeda no ho dze
column4: yɛmmpɛ dɛ yɛdze asɛm bi sie hom amma hom eenndzi awerɛhow dɛ nkaa no a wonnyi enyidado no."

column2: "Na sɛ yɛgye dzi dɛ Jesus wui na ɔsoɛɛr bio a
column3: dɛmara so na Nyankopɔn dze hɔn a wɔadeda wɔ Jesus mu bɛka no ho aba."
yɛnam Ewuradze asɛm do ka kyerɛ hom dɛ
column5: na yɛretsena ase ekodu Ewuradze ne mbae mu no
column6: yennkotwar hɔn a wɔadeda no ano."

column4: nye Nyankopɔn akasamu no fi sor besian
column5: na Kraest mu ewufo bedzi kan asoɛr;"

column2: "ansaana wɔaabɛfa hɛn a yɛtsetse ase na yɛaka no aka hɔn ho wɔ nsuwusiw no mu ma yeekehyia Ewuradze wɔ wimu
column3: na dɛm na yɛnye Ewuradze bɛtsena daa."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi hom mfa nsɛm yi nkyekyekye hom werɛ nkorkor."
